A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I made a rotten tomatoes account just so I could tell people to not go to this movie.  The character Rose was unbearable and made no sense to the plot other than trying to force a love triangle.  The only good actors in the entire film were Mark H. And Benicio.  Save your money and good memories of star wars and do not go to this movie. Go if you like seeing lame jokes and watching 2 hours of filler in a 3 hour movie.
